```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(stargazer)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

wrkdata = swiss
mod = lm(data=wrkdata,Infant.Mortality ~ Fertility + Agriculture + Education)
```

## R Markdown


```{r results = 'asis'}
xlabels = c('a','b','c')
stargazer(mod, type = 'html', title = 'tester', report = 'vc*sp',
          covariate.labels = xlabels,
          add.lines = c('hello','yo'))
```
